channel.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo
channel.description:
Just sent out a new beta to everyone who helped testing the previous version. The big news is that now you can (finally) undo any changes in the loop editor! ü•≥
Also in this version: - Old renders are automatically grouped and can be quickly deleted if you need to free up space on your device - New scenes are made empty by default (use duplicate if you want to copy an existing scene) - The last scene now stays selected when you play the track to the end - A few tweaks for improved graphics (can you spot the differences?)
If you want to test it and didn't get an invite: https://testflight.apple.com/join/sn4U8nQQ

item.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Just posted build 864, which we‚Äôre going to release publicly unless something new comes up.

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new:

  • Ducker is now enabled when master effects are switched off
  • Automatically increase gain when master effects are switched off
  • Fixed a bug that would sometimes cause drums not to make any sound for a few seconds when launching the app
  • Polished how individual samples are exported when that option is selected

Let us know if you find anything suspicious!

Read full topic

item.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo

item.description:
It works just like installing a regular update, so the projects will still be there. It‚Äôs always a good idea to keep projects backed up regardless.

item.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo
item.dc:creator: Aklibs
item.description:
Toggle Master Effects On/Off is great addon, but disabling Master effects also disable Ducker which it should not cuz my almost every project uses it and it‚Äôs not great idea to disable everything at once.
Why don‚Äôt we get option to choose which master effect we want to disable.
Like Toggle
Ducker On/Off
Gain. On/Off
Compressor On/Off
Limiter. On/Off

Read full topic

item.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
New beta build (863) just posted with the following updates:

  • Added option to disable master effects. Note that the limiter is still on but it will not engage unless you push the gain up a lot. In normal circumstances, we estimate that you will have ca 12 dB headroom before hitting the limiter.
  • Added option to render samples as individual stems. Just tap the ‚ÄúExport Stems‚Äù button and you will be asked whether you want to render the samples individually. This will need some additional polish and we can probably improve performance a bit.
  • Fixed scene preview graphic glitch so that the last loop doesn‚Äôt look cut-off.
  • Tapping the master gain slider now moves the handle correctly.

Let us know what you think about these changes and whether you find any issues! The plan is to release this version publicly next week.

Read full topic

item.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
What I‚Äôm guessing is that the prerecorded demo of the loop populates up on the drum kit as a pattern. Which, to be completely fair, I think would be a great idea. Even if tempo syncing wouldn‚Äôt exactly be much of a thing, and it might require redoing some of the demos, to have that pattern pre-populate up when the drum kit is loaded would be a great way to build off of a loop, almost like dragging and dropping a drum loop audio file into the workflow and building from there. Added points for it being modifiable.

Read full topic

AzureOnyx:

A very simple idea for this is to have the first loop or selected loop be the demo loop for the preset.

Could you elaborate on this so I understand? Do you want the browser to play specific demo loops for each sound?

item.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
AzureOnyx:

Another thing is there‚Äôs currently a minor annoyance is when selecting an instrument that‚Äôs already favorited in the main list, going back to the instrument from the home view automatically shows the favorited list instead of going into the previous list.

This

As said, a minor annoyance, but a recurring one that‚Äôs been tripping up workflows for a long time.

Ideally it would somehow remember which route you took to locate the instrument (i.e. favourite or regular storage) and follow that route back.

Read full topic

item.title: 6.6 Beta with Undo
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
I do kinda wish there was a ‚Äúsort by‚Äù option when navigating through the instruments list. I‚Äôm currently very lost on where instruments are because they‚Äôre not in the order they used to be at anymore.

Another thing is there‚Äôs currently a minor annoyance is when selecting an instrument that‚Äôs already favorited in the main list, going back to the instrument from the home view automatically shows the favorited list instead of going into the previous list.

I should‚Äôve mentioned this before the release of 6.5, but I was busy with irl stuffs, and couldn‚Äôt find the time to share

Another thing I would like to be added is for the user to create their own demo loop, likewise what we did when expanding the list of drum kits.
A very simple idea for this is to have the first loop or selected loop be the demo loop for the preset.

Read full topic
